backend/main.mo: Stateful Motoko actor managing ports with CRUD-like operations, geolocation points, and seeded Port of Tema data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a berthing-page UI update to impacted frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing routing, state, dashboards, and shared components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures React Router routes, wraps the app in theme and role providers, and mounts dashboards/pages.
frontend/src/components/common/DetailDra: Reusable sheet-based drawer component for displaying detail panels.
frontend/src/components/common/KpiCard.t: KPI card component showing a metric with icon, value, and optional trend styling.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryStat: Common loading skeleton, error state, and empty state components for data views.
frontend/src/components/common/StatusBad: Status badge that normalizes status strings and renders variant-colored labels.
Root layout with header, side navigation, and main content outlet.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderBar: Header bar with logo, role selector, navigation, and urgency alert count.
frontend/src/components/layout/SideNav.t: Renders a role‑based sidebar navigation with dynamic icons and active link highlighting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom Harbor theme color variables with utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/assignments/Assignmen: Dialog for editing assignment status using a form with controlled state and mutation handling.
Displays a table of assignments with related vessel/berth/tug data and supports create/edit actions.
frontend/src/pages/berthing/BerthDetailP: Detail drawer showing berth identification, location, specs, and operational info.
frontend/src/pages/berthing/BerthingPage: Berthing overview page loading port data and rendering grouped infrastructure cards.
frontend/src/pages/berthing/berthViewerM: Defines berth schedule/size logic and helper functions to augment and filter berthing points with mock occupancy data.
frontend/src/pages/berthing/Infrastructu: Renders grouped infrastructure cards for berths and facilities with draft, type, and location details.
frontend/src/pages/berthing/PortOfTemaOv: Displays port metadata, infrastructure KPIs, and a table of dry‑docking stations.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/BerthMaste: Dashboard showing berth KPIs and a table of berth occupancy with vessel assignments.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/Maintenanc: Dashboard for tugboat health, showing operational KPIs and equipment status with utilization.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PortOpsDas: Displays KPIs and tables for vessels, assignments, and alerts, providing a real-time port operations overview.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/TugDispatc: Shows tugboat availability, assignments, and fleet status with KPIs and detailed tables for dispatcher control.
frontend/src/pages/tugboats/TugboatHealt: Detail drawer presenting calculated health metrics and subsystem status for a selected tugboat.
frontend/src/pages/tugboats/TugboatsPage: Fleet overview table for all tugboats with assignment status and health, plus a detail drawer for health metrics.
frontend/src/pages/vessels/VesselDetailP: Detail drawer showing vessel specs, current berthing assignment, and assigned tugboats.
frontend/src/pages/vessels/VesselsPage.t: Vessel list with search, berth assignment display, and a detail panel for selected vessel information.
frontend/src/services/backendClient.ts: Defines react-query keys and exposes a hook to retrieve the backend actor.
frontend/src/services/mutations.ts: Contains a deprecated mutation hook for updating assignment status that now always errors.
frontend/src/services/queries.ts: Provides legacy query hooks returning empty data and Tema Port queries that fetch and transform port data.
frontend/src/state/role.ts: Defines role types and configuration objects including navigation and descriptions.
frontend/src/state/RoleProvider.tsx: Implements a React context for managing user roles with persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/types/legacy.ts: Stub interfaces for legacy vessel, berth, tugboat, assignment, and alert types.
frontend/src/types/temaPort.ts: Type definitions for structured Port of Tema metadata, infrastructure, and grouped assets.
frontend/src/utils/berthSpecs.ts: Utility functions for detecting, formatting, and validating berth specification values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes project state and feature requests related to replacing UI sections with infrastructure and tugboat card layouts.
